workflowId.cachedResultName: DEV - W3 - Find a slot in an outlook calendar and book into slot

data.text:
Ray Meiring is co‑founder and Chief Executive Officer of QorusDocs. He helped found the company in Cape Town in 2013 (with Lee Child and Stephanie Laurent) and led its move to the US (Bellevue/Seattle area) to scale QorusDocs’ proposal and RFP software for major technology and professional‑services firms. He oversees product and customer strategy and publishes regularly on AI, proposal management and go‑to‑market topics. Meiring led strategic growth initiatives including the company’s June 2025 acquisition of Shark Finesse.

Recent items
- QorusDocs acquires Shark Finesse — 24 June 2025 (QorusDocs blog)
- AI Proposal Software: Buy vs Build — 10 June 2025 (QorusDocs blog)

Links
- QorusDocs — Ray Meiring (author page): https://www.qorusdocs.com/ray-meiring-blog/author/ray-meiring
- Spotlight interview: WRG VC — https://www.wrg.vc/blog/spotlight-ray-meiring-co-founder-ceo-of-qorusdocs
- Accounting Today author page: https://www.accountingtoday.com/author/ray-meiring

Stephanie Laurent is cited as a co‑founder of QorusDocs, the proposal and document‑automation business founded in Cape Town in 2013. She is named alongside Ray Meiring and Lee Child in founder profiles and early company histories. Publicly available sources give limited detail on her current title or location; company material and founder interviews emphasise her role in the company’s early product and growth work. For the Legal Engine <> QorusDocs meeting, focus on her founder background, product experience for professional services, and connections with fellow founders.

Recent items
- Mentioned as a QorusDocs co‑founder in a founder spotlight — 10 July 2023 (WRG blog).
- Company content from QorusDocs referencing executive commentary and product direction — 24 June 2024 (QorusDocs blog).

Links
- WRG spotlight (mentions Stephanie as co‑founder): https://www.wrg.vc/blog/spotlight-ray-meiring-co-founder-ceo-of-qorusdocs
- QorusDocs (company site / blog): https://www.qorusdocs.com
- UK Companies House — QorusDocs Ltd officers: https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/13160418/officers

QorusDocs is an AI-powered proposal and RFP management software vendor (formerly Qorus/Qorus Software) that helps teams create, manage and automate proposals, presentations and RFP responses. Founded out of Cape Town and later operating from the US with a global footprint (including London), the company sells into sales and business‑development functions and advertises integrations with common content sources and Microsoft Office. I could not identify the specific QorusDocs individual due to meet Lee Curtis — please provide their name or LinkedIn so I can pull a full professional background.

Recent items
- QorusDocs raised $10M in a round led by WestRiver Group (reported 4 Oct 2022).
- Profiled on Dealroom and updated company listings in 2025 (Dealroom entry, Jul 2025).

Credible links
- Official site: https://www.qorusdocs.com
- Funding / press: https://www.geekwire.com/2022/qorusdocs-which-helps-companies-create-and-manage-sales-proposals-raises-10m/
- UK Companies House (officers): https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/13160418/officers
